item.title: Android and Mozilla
item.description:
With the first pre-alpha release of fennec for Google Android fennec the mozilla gecko engine has finally arrived on android mobile devices.A lot of it is still to be fixed and I can only say that people will love to see gecko on mobiles officially.

The current port is a big 11MB download which i just tested on my emulator.Need some more push to put it on the actual device.With this the following are the browsers which i know are available for android.

google chrome mobile opera mini mozilla fennec
